title: Counter-Strike 1.6 Modern Warface [ New Ambience ] [ Steam RIP ]
description:
Counter-Strike 1.6 Modern Warface is a game based on Counter-Strike 1.6 base . This is just a client game kit , the original Nexon Zombies have at the base the same game ( Counter-Strike 1.6 ) with some modification . Today I tried a little bit to make a client game which to look like the Nexon Zombies game and I think so this was successfully !

Before at all :
 - the textures are the originals , as in the Counter-Strike Nexon Zombies , they didn't changed the textures of the maps , to fell the CS 1.6 gameplay .
 - all weapons was changed with few CS:NZ models ( HIGH FPS , NO LAG )
 - there is no bugs
 - the game is 100% protected against hack methods
 - the game works offline and online
 - dual protocols : you can play on steam and no-steam servers
 - just 357Mb installer path
 - a new GUI background
 - original game files
 - original GUI and BUY menu
 - you can choose on which server to play from the 'Internet Server List' ( updated weekly )

SnapShot of the GUI Menu : http://i.imgur.com/HlDSsSG.png
